channel.title: Anybody use rgp maker xp?
channel.description:
hey, i need a bit of help with this program. I know it's stupid compared to other programs out there, but it's noob friendly.
my problem is, when I make an event that talks, then goes into battle, it goes straight to the game over screen. any ideas on what makes this screw up?
